actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to assure that rates and charges of regulated public utilities may not take into account any advertising expenditure of such utilities.

summary.text: Directs the President to take action to assure that any rule or regulation affecting any rate or charge of any regulated public utility does not allow such rate to include advertising expenditures. Defines terms as used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to assure that rates and charges of regulated public utilities may not take into account any advertising expenditure of such utilities.
